name: Quill Interactions: Stone Age Racing
summary: Stone Age Racing is a fast-paced, Indy-style timed circuit race that will challenge you physically and mentally! Designed in Oculus Quill and transformed into a full action first-person game, Stone Age Racing gives you an enhanced experience within a Quill world where you, the player, navigate and interact with the environment like never before. You are no longer just an observer but now a full participant, interacting and influencing the final...
